title: DETOX Drink Mix - 10ct
description: Great for powerful detoxification and healthy digestive support.
cleaned_text: Detox, Extra Strength A proprietary blend of seven organic and active ingredients for detoxification. Naturally flavored with herbs and real fruit powder. Ginger, Turmeric, Sea Berry, Aloe Vera, Milk Thistle, Cayenne, Lemon Suggested use: Mix one packet in 8-16 ounces of hot or cold water or other beverage daily or as needed Individually sealed stick packs are designed to stay fresh for up to 18 months. To guarantee long-term freshness, avoid long exposure to heat, overnight or for several days. Feel Something Good This clean, functional drink mix contains a powerful blend of high quality bioactive ingredients. No nonsense. GINGEROrganic Ginger Extract TURMERICOrganic Turmeric Extract SEABERRYOrganic Sea Buckthorn Tea Leaf ALOE VERAOrganic Vera MILK THISTLEOrganic Milk Thistle Extract CAYENNEOrganic Cayenne Pepper LEMONOrganic Lemon ginger Organic Ginger Extract turmeric Organic Turmeric Extract Seaberry Organic Sea Buckthorn Aloe Vera Freeze-dried Vera Milk Thistle Organic Milk Thistle Extract Cayenne Organic Cayenne Pepper lemon Organic Lemon
